mean_en: spending a lot more money or using a lot more of something than you can afford or than is necessary; costing a lot more money than you can afford or is necessary; (of ideas, speech or behaviour) very extreme or impressive but not reasonable or practical
sentence: The extravagant woman spent a large amount of money on these shoes.
sentence_trans: 那位奢侈的女士花了一大笔钱买这双鞋。
